org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer
Interface Transform

All Known Implementing Classes:
BucketingSortingReduceSinkOptimizer, BucketMapJoinOptimizer, ColumnPruner, Generator, GlobalLimitOptimizer, GroupByOptimizer, JoinReorder, ListBucketingPruner, MapJoinProcessor, NonBlockingOpDeDupProc, PartitionConditionRemover, PartitionPruner, PredicatePushDown, PredicateTransitivePropagate, ReduceSinkDeDuplication, RewriteGBUsingIndex, SamplePruner, SimpleFetchOptimizer, SkewJoinOptimizer, SortedMergeBucketMapJoinOptimizer, UnionProcessor
public interface Transform

Optimizer interface. All the rule-based optimizations implement this interface. All the transformations are invoked sequentially. They take the current parse context (which contains the operator tree among other things), perform all the optimizations, and then return the updated parse context.

Method Summary
 ParseContext transform(ParseContext pctx)
          All transformation steps implement this interface.
